name: The name field is required.
The name must be a string.
type: The type must be a string.
balance: The balance must be a number.
The balance must be at least 0.
open_date: The open date field is required.
The open date must be a string.
close_date: The close date must be a string.
The close date must be a date after or equal to open date.
status: The status must be a string.
